Course Staff.name: Alan Liang
Course Staff.blurb: Hi! I am a EECS Masters student, previously having majored in Economics and CS at Cal. I’m sort of from Shanghai, and this semester I also teach ECON 140. Some things I enjoy include discovering good food, shibes, consumerism, and data science; guess which one is my favorite ;’) Looking forward to a great semester and e-meeting you all!

Course Staff.name: Chris Pyles
Course Staff.blurb: Hi! I'm a fourth-year CS + DS major, and I also teach Data 100. Looking forward to meeting everyon this semester!

Connector Assistants.name: Avantika Ghosh
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hello, my name is Avantika Ghosh and I am a 2nd year student studying Computer Science and Economics. As one of your Connector Assistants in Data 88E, I am very excited to delve deeper into the exciting world of Data Science and Economics this Spring with all of you! I look forward to meeting everyone in my Office Hours.

Connector Assistants.name: Emily Guo
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hey! My name is Emily. I'm a sophomore studying Data Science and Economics. In my free time, I like to travel, listen to music, and watch YouTube videos. Looking forward to meeting you all this semester!

Connector Assistants.name: Matthew Yep
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hi my name is Matthew, and I’m a junior studying economics and data science. I like to watch the NBA, play Settlers of Catan, and have been learning how to fish during lockdown.

Connector Assistants.name: Rohan Jha
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hey! I actually just took this course last semester and so I have a pretty recent experience with what it’s like to take this course - feel free to hmu for tips on how to succeed. Other than that, I’m an international kid from Dubai who’s into boxing, casual philosophy (in other words, I hate essays) and having new experiences (feel free to reach out to me with any ideas lol).  Looking forward to meeting y’all this semester.

Connector Assistants.name: Sreeja Apparaju
Connector Assistants.blurb: Hello! My name is Sreeja and I’m a sophomore studying Economics and Computer Science. I took this course during my first semester and this will be my second time CA’ing it. I enjoy caffeinated drinks, board games and anything to do with food. I am really excited meet y’all this semester! (Please don’t forgot your wear your face masks and stay safe!)
